price: (1) Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī nazzala al-fur'qāna ʿalā ʿabdihi liyakūna lil'ʿālamīna nadhīran
